name: Star Berry Indica
description: Star Berry Indica is an indica strain bred by CannaVenture that crosses Sensi Star with Blueberry. These dense, pungent buds offer a lemon and berry aroma with physical effects true to its indica heritage. As a stable strain, Star Berry Indica is a great choice for beginning growers who can expect flowers around 60 days.
descriptionPlain: Star Berry Indica is an indica strain bred by CannaVenture that crosses Sensi Star with Blueberry. These dense, pungent buds offer a lemon and berry aroma with physical effects true to its indica heritage. As a stable strain, Star Berry Indica is a great choice for beginning growers who can expect flowers around 60 days.

highlightedReviews.text:
Method of consumption: Kandypen Galaxy.

Type: Terps Star Berry Shatter.

Pros: Relaxing and pain relief. 

Cons: Dry mouth and minor dry eyes.

Overall/Other: Smooth draw and exhale. Berry taste, just a faint hint of lemon/citrus every so often. Body is relaxed and  pain melted away. No real head effects, other than relaxation & calm feelings. No real munchies. Minor couch lock. Little tiredness, but more due to relaxation then sleepyness.

I would recommend this strain for relaxation and pain relief that could be used anytime, but best saved for afterwork/evenings.
great taste the effects were rite on point had a lot of belly pain took the pain away

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Drizella, Star Berry Indica, Big Sur Holy Bud, Dream Police, and Purple Cheese
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Thanks to all the Leafly users who submitted strain nominations this week! Our strain database now exceeds 1,000 varieties, but our collection is far from finished so keep the suggestions coming. Drizella, Star Berry Indica, Big Sur Holy Bud, Dream Police, and Purple Cheese are only a few among many newly added varieties, so don't forget to check out all of the other newcomers in the strain Explorer!
   1. Drizella
Characteristics of Drizella:

Mostly sativa
Cross between Cinderella 99, White Widow, and Space Queen
Breeder: Dynasty Seeds
Tropical pineapple, citrus, and vanilla aroma
Clear, stimulating cerebral effects
Indoor flowering time of 60 days

   2. Star Berry Indica
Characteristics of Star Berry Indica:

Mostly indica
Cross between Sensi Star and Blueberry
Breeder: CannaVenture
Lemon and berry aroma
Heavy, relaxing effects
Indoor flowering time of 60 days

 
   3. Dream Police
Characteristics of Dream Police:

Balanced hybrid
Cross between AK-47 and Dreamy Bubbles
Breeder: Crazy Diamonds
Spicy and sweet floral aroma
May help ease pain and stress
Indoor flowering time of 60 days

   4. Big Sur Holy Bud
Characteristics of Big Sur Holy Bud:

Mostly sativa
Unknown lineage
Breeder: Bodhi Seeds
Blueberry, menthol aroma
Uplifting cerebral effects

   5. Purple Cheese
Characteristics of Purple Cheese:

Indica-dominant autoflowering hybrid
Cross between Purple #1, Blue Cheese, and Lowryder
Breeder: Auto Seeds
Sweet, fruity aroma
Can exhibit a high CBD content
Powerful full-body relief
